name: Naddando
overview: Naddando is a game inspired by the great C64 classic Commando, a new game in honour of that particular classic on its 35th anniversary. Furthermore not only is this latest game created by Commodore Spain regarded as a shooter in an aquatic environment, but it also has nods to other games like Rambo Part II or Ikari Warriors within the limitations of the used engine created for this particular game....
